headline: NVR, INC. APPOINTS NEW MEMBER TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
summary: NVR, Inc. (NYSE: NVR) announced today that George R. Oliver has been appointed to its Board of Directors as an independent director effective October 1, 2025.
